name: Holy Night Rayel
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Holy Night" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Holy Night" monster in your GY, except "Holy Night Rayel"; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Holy Night Rayel" once per turn.
